de.polygonal.ds.GraphNode

type
class
A graph node manages a doubly linked list of graph arcs.

Constructor

new(x : T)
Creates a graph node storing x.

Instance Variables

arcList : GraphArc<T>

The head of a a doubly linked list of graph arcs.

next : GraphNode<T>

The Graph class manages a doubly linked list of graph nodes; this is a reference to the next graph node in the list.

prev : GraphNode<T>

The Graph class manages a doubly linked list of graph nodes; this is a reference to the previous graph node in the list.

val : T

The node's value.

Instance Methods

addArc(target : GraphNode<T>, cost : Float) : Void

parameters
cost Defines how 'hard' it is to get from one node to the other.
throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError target is null or arc to target already exists (if debug flag is set).
Adds an uni-directional arc, pointing from this node to the specified target node.

getArc(target : GraphNode<T>) : GraphArc<T>

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError target is null or target equals this (if debug flag is set).
Finds the arc that is pointing to the specified target node or null if an arc was not found.

isConnected(target : GraphNode<T>) : Bool

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError target is null (if debug flag is set).
Returns true if this node is connected to the specified target node.

isMarked() : Bool

Returns true if the graph node was marked during a DFS/BFS traversal.

isMutuallyConnected(target : GraphNode<T>) : Bool

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError target is null (if debug flag is set).
Returns true if this node and the specified target node are pointing to each other.

iterator() : Iterator<T>

Iterates over all connected graph nodes.

removeArc(target : GraphNode<T>) : Void

throws
de.polygonal.core.util.AssertionError target is null or arc to target does no exist (if debug flag is set).
Removes an arc that is pointing to the specified target node.

removeMutualArcs() : Void

Remove all outgoing and incoming arcs from this node

removeSingleArcs() : Void

Removes all outgoing arcs from this node.

toString() : String

Returns a string representing the current object. Prints out additional information if compiled with the -debug flag.
